pageProps.data:
## MorphTransform

###### Params

| Param | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
|**tSrc**|<var>[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)</var>|The source image to be downsampled.|
|**type**|<var>string</var>|Size of structure element.|
|**kernelSize**|<var>Array.\<number></var>|Size of structure element|
|**tKernel**|<var>[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)</var>|Optional kernel.|

###### Example

```js
gm.morphologyEx(inputImage, 'open', [3, 3]);
```
